channel.title: Home on Awesome Hugo blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Awesome Hugo blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I recently started to consider the option of having a tiny blog where I could be able to tell stories, and talk about what I want. So here we are! A new dawn Welcome! This website isn’t only a blog, but also the home of everything you need to find about me : my social media links, the projects I had over the time, and all the info and story of mine, which you can find in the About section.

item.title: About Me
item.description: It has taken some time to get me interested in how computers work and untill I got my first experiences in this wonderful land. Let’s take a look. My story Ever since I remember, I always got interested in how things work. I always have been fullfilled with curiosity and wonders about how the world works. But it’s only at age six that I was immersed in the world of boop-beeps.
